TEI:
Kalittokai 90.
itu “pullutaṉ mayakkum pulavik kaṇṇum” (to.po.151) eṉpataṉāṟ ṟalaivaṉ pulappaṭap parattaiyariṭattu oḻukātu maṟaintoḻuki vantu niṉṟavaṉuṭaṉ kāmakkiḻatti ūṭic collit talaimakaṉ āṟṟāmai kaṇṭu taṉ āṟṟāmaiyuñ colli ūṭaṟīrntatu.
kaṇṭēṉiṉ māyaṅ kaḷavātal poynnakā
maṇṭāta collit toṭāa ṟoṭīiyaniṉ
peṇṭi ruḷarmaṉṉō vīṅku;
oṇṭoṭinī, kaṇṭa tevaṉō tavaṟu;
kaṇṭatu, nōyum vaṭuvuṅ karantu makiḻcerukkip
pāṭu peyaṉiṉṟa pāṉā ḷiraviṟ
ṟoṭipoli tōḷu mulaiyuṅ katuppum
vaṭivār kuḻaiyu miḻaiyum poṟaiyā
voṭivatu pōlu nucuppō ṭaṭitaḷarā
vārāk kavavi ṉoruttivan talkaṟṟaṉ
cīrār ñekiḻañ cilampac civantuniṉ
pōrār katava mititta tamaiyumō
vāyiḻai yārkku molikēḷā vavvetir
tāḻā teḻuntunī ceṉṟa tamaiyumō
māṟāḷ ciṉaiiyava ḷāṅkēniṉ mārpi
ṉāṟiṇarp paintār parinta tamaiyumō
tēṟinī tīyē ṉalēṉeṉṟu maṟṟavaḷ
cīṟaṭi tōyā viṟutta tamaiyumō
kūṟiṉik kāyēmō yām;
tēṟiṟ, piṟavun tavaṟilēṉ yāṉ;
alkaṟ, kaṉavuko ṉīkaṇ ṭatu;
kaṉaipeyaṟ, ṟaṇṭuḷi vīcum poḻutiṟ kuṟivantāṭ
kaṇṭa kaṉaveṉak kāṇātu māṟuṟṟup
paṇṭaiya vallaniṉ poyccū ṇiṉakkellā
niṉṟāyniṉ pukkil pala;
meṉṟōḷāy, nalkuniṉ ṉalleḻi luṇku;
ēṭā, kuṟaiyuṟṟu nīyem muraiyaṉiṉ ṟīmai
poṟaiyāṟṟē meṉṟal peṟutumō yāḻa
niṟaiyāṟṟā neñcuṭai yēm.
